channel.title: Post on BeautifulBoy

item.title: 二分查找
item.description: 二分查找 代码示例 def binary_search(list,item): low = 0 high = len(list) - 1 while low <= high: mid = int((low + high)/2) //这里需要注意floa和int转型 guess = list[mid] if guess == item: return mid if guess > mid: high = mid - 1 else: low = mid + 1 return None if __name__ == '__main__': my_list = [1,2,3] print(my_list) print(binary_search(my_list,1)) 结束
